archimate:BusinessProcess.name: F. Migration Planning
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Detaljert migreringsplanlegging. Sammenheng med prosjektkontorer osv.
Objectives: * Finalize the Architecture Roadmap and the supporting Implementation and Migration Plan * Ensure that the Implementaiton and Migration Plan is coordinated with the enterprise's approach to manageming and impleentation change in the enterprises overal change portifolio. * Ensure that the business value and cos of work packages and traisison Architectures is uderstood by key stakeholders
Approach * The focus is cration of the Implementation and Migration plan in co-operation with project and portifolio managers * Activites include the dependencies, costs, and benefits of the various migration projects within the context of the entpries's other activity
